com.paydiant.android.core.facade

Class SDKLoggingProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.paydiant.android.core.facade.SDKLoggingProvider
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ATMCashManagerFacade, CustomerManagerFacade, DeviceInfoManagerFacade, GiftAccountManagerFacade, LoyaltyManagerFacade, OfferManagerFacade, OrderHistoryManagerFacade, PaydiantGCMUtilityFacade, PaymentAccountManagerFacade, QRCodeManagerFacade, ReceiptManagerFacade, SecureCloudManagerFacade, SecurityManagerFacade, TransactionFlowManagerFacade, TransactionManagerFacade, UserRegistrationManagerFacade

    public class SDKLoggingProvider
extends Object
    A utility class to support SDK internal logging of successful/failed events. This class is intended for SDK's internal use ONLY. In order to log custom messages for apps, use PaydiantLoggingUtility.
    Since:
    4.6.0.1
    Author:
    Paydiant

    • Constructor Detail

      • SDKLoggingProvider

        public SDKLoggingProvider()

    • Method Detail

      • addSuccessLogMessage

        public void addSuccessLogMessage(PaydiantLoggingEventType eventType)
        Utility method to log successful events. This internally calls the SDKLoggingHelper.getSDKLoggingUtility() instance's ISDKLoggingUtility.addSuccessLogMessage(PaydiantLoggingEventType) to add the event details.
        Parameters:
        eventType - event type of the successful event. (E.g.: PaydiantLoggingEventType.ADD_ACCOUNT_SUCCESS)

      • addSuccessLogMessage

        public void addSuccessLogMessage(PaydiantLoggingEventType eventType,
                        LinkedHashMap<PaydiantLoggingEntryKey,String> eventParameters)
        Utility method to log successful events and their parameters. This internally calls the SDKLoggingHelper.getSDKLoggingUtility() instance's ISDKLoggingUtility.addSuccessLogMessage(PaydiantLoggingEventType, LinkedHashMap) to add the event details and parameters.
        Parameters:
        eventType - event type of the successful event. (E.g.: PaydiantLoggingEventType.ADD_ACCOUNT_SUCCESS)
        eventParameters - Additional parameters that needed to be passed along with the successful event, if applicable.

      • addFailedLogMessage

        public void addFailedLogMessage(PaydiantLoggingEventType eventType,
                       PaydiantException e)
        Utility method to log failed events. This internally calls the SDKLoggingHelper.getSDKLoggingUtility() instance's ISDKLoggingUtility.addFailedLogMessage(PaydiantLoggingEventType, String, PaydiantException) to add the failed event details.
        Parameters:
        eventType - event type of the failed event. (E.g.: PaydiantLoggingEventType.ADD_ACCOUNT_FAIL)
        e - PaydiantException object returned for the failed event, if available.

      • addFailedLogMessage

        public void addFailedLogMessage(PaydiantLoggingEventType eventType,
                       PaydiantException e,
                       LinkedHashMap<PaydiantLoggingEntryKey,String> eventParameters)
        Utility method to log failed events with event parameters. This internally calls the SDKLoggingHelper.getSDKLoggingUtility() instance's ISDKLoggingUtility.addFailedLogMessage(PaydiantLoggingEventType, String, PaydiantException, LinkedHashMap) to add the failed event details and the parameters.
        Parameters:
        eventType - event type of the failed event. (E.g.: PaydiantLoggingEventType.ADD_ACCOUNT_FAIL)
        e - PaydiantException object returned for the failed event, if available.
        eventParameters - Additional parameters that needed to be passed along with the failed event, if applicable.

      • sendLogMessages

        public void sendLogMessages()
        Sends the log messages to the server. This internally calls the SDKLoggingHelper.getSDKLoggingUtility() instance's ISDKLoggingUtility.sendLogMessages() to send the log messages.

      • sendLogMessagesDelayed

        public void sendLogMessagesDelayed()
        Delays sending log messages to the server. This would be utilized during logging failure events to allow app developers to set the failure event display message through the PaydiantLoggingUtility.setLastFailedEventDisplayMessage(String) method, before sending the log entries to the server. This currently provides a 5 second window before sending the log messages.
        Since:
        4.7.0.2

      • startProfiling

        public void startProfiling()
        Starts capturing profiling information.
        Since:
        5.2.0.1

      • stopProfiling

        public void stopProfiling()
        Stops capturing profiling information. Captured information will be appended to logs.
        Since:
        5.2.0.1
